language.entry: Dryad

The Dryads settled into the Emerald Grove - deep within the confines of the Weald. Here they believed they were safe from predators and harm. Little did they realize a darkness lurked in this land. The corrupted Hag hunted them as components for her wicked spells - so they fled to seek aid and enact vengeance upon the witch.
In battle the Dryad prefers to keep her distance - she communes with nature around her to aid her in battle. Her skills can aid herself and her allies - but also poison her enemies.
At camp the Dryad likes to search the path ahead - scouts out new chances and opportunities. She can also heal her allies if needed.

The scent of the flowers will clear your wounds.
Take in the aroma, let it fill your senses.
Skin like stone - heart of granite.
The cover of the trees will keep us warm.
Cold embrace...
The gentle breeze - the canopy of green delight...
I yearn for my heart home - my epilobium soul...
Never give up!
Too bad we won't live - then again, who does...
My soul will linger - in the darkness to come.
I have but a short span here - my oak needs me...
I will not fail you...
